name: external kriging
desc: The external_kriging will output both data and a grid in the simple GeoEAS format.

properties.name: Translate Coordinates
properties.desc: The Translate Coordinates toggle when turned on, translates the entire model back to the origin based on the values input.  If the input values are left at 0.0 the values will be calculated based on the centroid of the model.

properties.name: Translate Values
properties.desc: If the Translate Coordinates toggle is turned on, translates the entire model back to the origin based on the Translate Values input.  If the input values are left at 0.0 the values will be calculated based on the centroid of the model.

properties.name: Exponentiate Exported Log Data
properties.desc: If any nodal data is log processed then turning this toggle on will exponentiate it before export.

properties.name: Export Nodal Data For Output
properties.desc: The Export Nodal Data For Output control allows the user to selecte the nodal data for output

properties.name: Export Data Filename
properties.desc: The Filename for the exported data.

properties.name: Exponentiate Log Grid Data
properties.desc: If there is data on the grid that has been log processed, this toggle will cause it to be exponentiated when exported.

properties.name: Nodal Data For Grid Output
properties.desc: Select the Nodal Data For Grid Output.

properties.name: Export Grid Filename
properties.desc: The filename of the exported grid.
